title: A qualitative investigation to understand the challenges and representation of women in the media industry of Bangladesh
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Noshin Yeasmin, Morsheda Akter Heme, Maherun Nahar Mumu, Taufiq-E-Ahmed Shovo, Rina Aktar, Hamalna Nizam, Md. Tanvir Hossain, Tunvir Ahamed Shohel
